Nightlight:

"it's a pleasure, Rodimus"replied Nightlight whit a smile, she had 
seen how noble, kind and brave he was. She couldn't find other words 
to define his personality.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> His smile became wider, and he took her arm. He started walking 
with her towards the Mess Hall.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: I'm happy to have your company, Nightlight.
> 
> He looked at her, taking in her looks. He was surprised he had not 
noticed how beautiful she was until the last few days. He was glad 
that he took notice eventually though.
